title: Kenya Mountain Trekking and Hiking Safaris

requirements.intro: Make sure you have everything you need to help you successfully summit the Roof of Africa with this handy final checklist.
travelDocuments: International health card with immunizations (Yellow Fever)
US$ cash / Travelers Cheques / Credit Card
essentialItems: Duffel bag - large enough for all climbing gear and clothing (carried by porters)
Extra bag to be left at the hotel with spare gear
highAltitudeGear: Waterproof, breathable & windproof jacket (Ventex, Gore-Tex, Jeantex)
footwear: Shoes for overnight camps (sneakers / running shoes)
equipment: Water bottles (total capacity at least 6 litres)
Headlamp with spare batteries and bulb
Sunglasses with dark lenses and securing strap
personalItems: Ziploc bags for camera and electronics
Money belt for passport and valuables
medicalAndFirstAid: Altitude sickness - Diamox (if not allergic to sulpha)
Supplies for sprains, blisters, cuts (plasters, bandages)
optionalItems: Plastic bags to keep clothing dry

safaris.title: MT. KENYA : SIRIMON OUT SIRIMON ROUTE

itinerary.title: Nairobi - Sirimon Gate - Old Moses
itinerary.description: Depart Nairobi at 7:00 am for Sirimon Park Gate. After park formalities, trek 9 km (3-4 hours), ascending 690 metres to Old Moses Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

itinerary.title: Old Moses - Shiptons Camp
itinerary.description: Trek 14 km (6-7 hours), ascending 890 metres to Shiptons Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

itinerary.title: Summit Day
itinerary.description: Trek 3-5 hours, ascending 755 metres to Point Lenana to witness sunrise. Descend back to Old Moses Camp. Dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: Old Moses - Nairobi
itinerary.description: After breakfast descend to Sirimon Park Gate and transfer to Nairobi, arriving in the evening.

safaris.title: MT. KENYA : SIRIMON OUT NAROMORU TRAVERSE

itinerary.title: Nairobi - Sirimon Gate - Old Moses Camp
itinerary.description: Depart Nairobi at 7:00 am and drive to Sirimon Park Gate. Trek to Old Moses Camp. Dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: Old Moses Camp - Shiptons Camp
itinerary.description: Trek 13 km (6-7 hours), ascending 890 metres to Shiptons Camp. Dinner and overnight at Mackinderâ€™s Camp.

itinerary.title: Shiptons - Mackinders Camp
itinerary.description: Hike through the western circuit via Hausberg Col and Two Tarn to Mackinders Camp. Distance 8 km, 5-6 hours. Dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: Mackinders - Summit - Met Station Camp
itinerary.description: Early morning summit attempt to Point Lenana (4-5 hours). Descend approximately 12 km to Met Station Camp with lunch en route. Dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: Met Station - Naro Moru Gate - Nairobi
itinerary.description: After breakfast descend to Naro Moru Gate and transfer back to Nairobi, arriving in the afternoon.

safaris.notes: We acknowledge and accommodate route changes recommended by our clients.

itinerary.title: NAIROBI - MET STATION
itinerary.description: Depart Nairobi at 7:00 am for Naro Moru Park Gate. After park formalities, trek 10 km (4-5 hours), ascending 900 metres to Met Station Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

itinerary.title: MET STATION - MACKINDERS CAMP
itinerary.description: Trek 8 km (5-6 hours), ascending 950 metres to Mackinders Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

itinerary.title: SUMMIT DAY
itinerary.description: Trek 4-5 hours, ascending 755 metres to Point Lenana to witness sunrise. Descend back to Met Station Camp. Dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: MACKINDERS CAMP - NAIROBI
itinerary.description: After breakfast descend further down to Naromoru Park Gate where you are transferred to Nairobi arriving in the evening.

itinerary.title: NAIROBI - NANYUKI
itinerary.description: Depart Nairobi at 8:00 am for Nanyuki. Overnight at a hotel.

itinerary.title: NANYUKI - SIRIMON GATE - OLD MOSES CAMP ( JUDIMEIRS )
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Sirimon Park Gate. Trek 9 km (3-4 hours), ascending 690 metres to Old Moses Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

itinerary.title: OLD MOSES CAMP - SHIPTONS CAMP
itinerary.description: After breakfast we hike via Likii and mackinders valley with lunch en route to shiptons camp 4200 mtrs 6-7 hrs 14 km for dinner/ overnight.

itinerary.title: SHIPTONS CAMP
itinerary.description: This day after b/fast the client will walk to the climbing base explore the route as well as take their equipment ready to start the climb following day. Lunch, dinner and overnight at shiptons camp 4200 mts.

itinerary.title: SUMMIT DAYS
itinerary.description: Start the climb early in the morning to reach the summit of batian 5199 mtrs via the normal route (6-8 hrs) then descend back to shiptons camp for lunch dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: SUMMIT DAYS
itinerary.description: Start the climb early in the morning to reach the summit of batian 5199 mtrs via the normal route (6-8 hrs) then descend back to shiptons camp for lunch dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: NANYUKI/ NARO MORU
itinerary.description: After breakfast descend to Naro moru park gate and transfer to Nanyuki for overnight at a hotel.

itinerary.title: NANYUKI - NAIROBI
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive back to Nairobi arriving in the afternoon.

safaris.title: MT. KENYA: IN SIRIMON - OUT NARO MORU

itinerary.title: ARRIVAL NAIROBI - NANYUKI
itinerary.description: Meet and greet at the Airport and later depart and drive North to Naromoru town and transferred to Mountain rock Hotel or Equivalent for dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: NANYUKI - SIRIMON GATE - OLD MOSES CAMP
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Sirimon Park Gate. Trek 9 km (3-4 hours), ascending 690 metres to Old Moses Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

itinerary.title: OLD MOSES CAMP - SHIPTONS CAMP
itinerary.description: Trek 14 km (6-7 hours), ascending 890 metres to Shiptons Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

itinerary.title: SHIPTONS CAMP - MACKINDERS CAMP
itinerary.description: Hike through the western circuit via Hausberg Col and Two Tarn to Mackinders Camp. Distance 8 km, 5-6 hours. Dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: SUMMIT DAY
itinerary.description: Wake up at 2.30 am  and ascend to Point Lenana arriving  early  in the morning to witness the sunrise. Trek down to Mackinders for breakfast and then further more to Met station.  Dinner and overnight at the camp.

itinerary.title: MET STATION - NAIROBI
itinerary.description: After breakfast descend further down to Naromoru Park Gate where you are transferred to Nairobi having lunch en-route arriving in the evening at the Airport for your onward flight.

safaris.title: MT. KENYA: IN NARO MORU - OUT CHOGORIA

itinerary.title: NAIROBI - NANYUKI
itinerary.description: Meet and greet at the Airport and later depart and drive North to Naromoru town and transferred to Mountain Rock Hotel or equivalent for dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: NANYUKI - NARO MORU GATE - MET STATION
itinerary.description: Depart at 7.00 am for Naromoru Park Gate. After park formalities trek 10 km (3-4 hours), ascending 690 metres to Met Station. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

itinerary.title: MET STATION - MACKINDERS CAMP
itinerary.description: After breakfast, continue ascending to Mackinders Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

itinerary.title: MACKINDERS CAMP - SUMMIT - MINTOS HUT
itinerary.description: Wake up at 2.30 am and ascend to Point Lenana to witness sunrise. Descend to Mintos Hut for breakfast and relaxation. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

itinerary.title: MINTOS HUT - MERU BANDAS
itinerary.description: After breakfast descend to Meru Bandas for lunch. Afternoon at leisure. Dinner and overnight at the bandas.

itinerary.title: MERU BANDAS - CHOGORIA - NAIROBI
itinerary.description: Descend to Chogoria town with an option of walking or using a 4x4 vehicle. Lunch en-route, then drive to Nairobi Airport for outbound flight.

itinerary.title: NAIROBI - NANYUKI
itinerary.description: Meet and greet at the Airport and drive north to Naromoru town. Dinner and overnight at Mountain Rock Hotel or equivalent.

itinerary.title: NANYUKI - SIRIMON GATE - OLD MOSES CAMP
itinerary.description: Drive to Sirimon Park Gate (2600m). After park formalities hike to Old Moses (Judmeirs) Camp at 3300m, taking 3-4 hours.

itinerary.title: OLD MOSES CAMP - SHIPTONS CAMP
itinerary.description: After breakfast hike to Shiptons Camp (4200m). Lunch en route. Dinner and overnight at the camp. Trek takes 6-7 hours.

itinerary.title: SHIPTONS CAMP - ACCLIMATIZATION
itinerary.description: Acclimatization day at Shiptons Camp. Rest day to prepare for summit. Dinner and overnight at Shiptons Camp.

itinerary.title: SUMMIT DAY - MERU BANDAS
itinerary.description: Attempt Point Lenana (4985m). Descend via Mintos for breakfast, then continue to Meru Bandas. Lunch en route. Dinner and overnight at the lodge. 8-9 hours.

itinerary.title: MERU BANDAS - CHOGORIA - NAIROBI
itinerary.description: Descend through bamboo and rainforest to meet vehicle for transfer to Chogoria town, then proceed to Nairobi arriving in the evening. Transfer to airport.

safaris.title: MT. KENYA: IN SIRIMON - OUT CHOGORIA

itinerary.title: NAIROBI - NANYUKI
itinerary.description: Meet and greet at the Airport and drive north to Naromoru town. Dinner and overnight at Mountain Rock Hotel or equivalent.

itinerary.title: NANYUKI - SIRIMON GATE - OLD MOSES CAMP
itinerary.description: Drive to Sirimon Park Gate and trek to Old Moses Camp. Dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: OLD MOSES CAMP - SHIPTONS CAMP
itinerary.description: Trek 13 km (6-7 hours), ascending 890 metres to Shiptons Camp. Dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: SHIPTONS CAMP - MACKINDERS CAMP
itinerary.description: Hike via Hausberg Col and Two Tarn to Mackinders Camp (4300m). Distance 8 km, 5-6 hours.

itinerary.title: SUMMIT DAY
itinerary.description: Early morning ascent to Point Lenana for sunrise. Descend to Meru Bandas for breakfast and relaxation. Dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: MERU BANDAS - CHOGORIA - NAIROBI
itinerary.description: Descend to Chogoria town with walking or 4x4 option. Lunch en-route then drive to Nairobi. Dinner and overnight at hotel.

itinerary.title: DEPARTURE
itinerary.description: Breakfast at the hotel, check-out and transfer to the airport for outbound flight.

safaris.title: MT. KENYA: IN NARO MORU – OUT CHOGORIA

itinerary.title: NAIROBI - NANYUKI
itinerary.description: Meet and greet at the Airport and drive north to Naromoru town. Dinner and overnight at Mountain Rock Hotel or equivalent.

itinerary.title: NANYUKI - NARO MORU GATE - MET STATION
itinerary.description: Depart at 7.00 am for Naromoru Park Gate. After park formalities trek 10 km (3-4 hours), ascending 690 metres to Met Station. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

itinerary.title: MET STATION - MACKINDERS CAMP
itinerary.description: After breakfast, continue ascending to Mackinders Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

itinerary.title: SUMMIT DAY
itinerary.description: Wake up at 2.30 am  and ascend to Point Lenana arriving  early  in the morning to witness the sunrise. Trek more to Mintos hut for breakfast and relaxation.  Dinner and overnight at the camp.

itinerary.title: MINTOS HUT - MERU BANDAS
itinerary.description: Breakfast, descend to Meru Bandas for lunch. Afternoon at leisure. Dinner and overnight at the Bandas.

itinerary.title: MERU BANDAS - CHOGORIA - NAIROBI
itinerary.description: Descend from Meru Bandas to Chogoria Town with option of walking half way for 7 hrs or take a 4x4 vehicle and drive for 2 hrs to Chogoria town for lunch. Later drive for about 3 hrs to Nairobi. Dinner and overnight at Sentrim Boulevard or Sentrim 680 Hotel.

itinerary.title: DEPARTURE
itinerary.description: Breakfast at the hotel, check-out and transfer to the airport for outbound flight.

safaris.title: MT. KENYA: IN SIRIMON – OUT NARO MORU

itinerary.title: NAIROBI - NANYUKI
itinerary.description: Meet and greet at the Airport and later depart and drive North to Naromoru town and transferred to Mountain rock Hotel or Equivalent for dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: NANYUKI - SIRIMON GATE - OLD MOSES CAMP
itinerary.description: Depart 7:00am drive to Sirimon Park gate. After park formalities trek Old Moses Camp. Dinner and overnight at Old Moses Camp.

itinerary.title: OLD MOSES - SHIPTONS CAMP
itinerary.description: Trek 13 Kilometres (6-7) hours, 890 Metres ascend to Shiptons Camp. Dinner and overnight at Shiptons Camp.

itinerary.title: SHIPTONS CAMP - MACKINDERS CAMP
itinerary.description: Hike via Hausberg Col and Two Tarn to Mackinders Camp (4300m). Distance 8 km, 5-6 hours.

itinerary.title: SUMMIT DAY
itinerary.description: Early morning ascent to Point Lenana for sunrise. Descend to Meru Bandas for breakfast and relaxation. Dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: MERU BANDAS - NARO MORU - NANYUKI
itinerary.description: Descend to Naro Moru Park Gate, then transfer to Nanyuki for lunch. Afternoon at leisure. Dinner and overnight at Mountain Rock Hotel or equivalent.

itinerary.title: NANYUKI - NAIROBI - DEPARTURE
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive back to Nairobi arriving in the afternoon for your outbound flight.

safaris.title: Mt Kenya Climb / Solio Ranch / Samburu Game Reserve

itinerary.title: Arrival Nairobi - Transfer to Mt Kenya Region
itinerary.description: Meet and greet at the Airport, briefing and later transferred to Mount Kenya region approximately 3 hrs drive for lunch or dinner. Dinner and overnight at Aberdare Country Club or Equivalent.

itinerary.title: NANYUKI - SIRIMON GATE - OLD MOSES CAMP
itinerary.description: Breakfast at Aberdare country club or equivalent, drive to Solio Ranch for morning and afternoon game drives with picnic lunches. This Ranch has abundant wildlife and about 300 species of birds. Dinner and overnight at Aberdare Country Club or Equivalent.

itinerary.title: Aberdares - Old Moses
itinerary.description: Depart 7:00am drive to Sirimon Park gate. After park formalities trek to Old Moses Camp. Dinner and overnight at Old Moses Camp.

itinerary.title: Old Moses - Shiptons Camp
itinerary.description: Trek 13 Kilometres (6-7) hours, 890 Metres ascend to Shiptons Camp. Dinner and overnight at Mackinder's Camp.

itinerary.title: Mackinders Camp
itinerary.description: Hike through the western circuit to hausberg col and tarn. Then from two tarn to mackinders camp 4300 mts distance 8 kms taking 5-6 hrs. Dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: Attempt Point Lenana - Met station
itinerary.description: At around 2 am we attempt point Lenana 4985 mts 4-5 hrs and descend more down for about 12 kms to met station having lunch en route. Dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: Met Station - NaroMoru Gate - Aberdare National Park
itinerary.description: After breakfast trek further down to Naro Moru Gate from where you are transferred to Aberdare National Park arriving for lunch in the afternoon. After lunch, you are transferred to the Tree Lodge ( The Ark ) having game drives enroute. Spend the evening watching different wild animals as the come to drink water from the water hole. Dinner and overnight at the Ark Tree Lodge.

itinerary.title: Aberdare National Park - Samburu Game Reserve
itinerary.description: After breakfast, Depart and drive more North past the Equator to Samburu Game Reserve. This is a semi arid area and thus has many Animal species adaptive to dry and hot climate and not found in many other parks in Kenya including, the Reticulated Giraffe, Long - necked gerenuk, Oryx, Grevy's Zebra and many more. Dinner and overnight at Samburu Sopa Lodge Or Samburu Sentrim Camp.

itinerary.title: SAMBURU GAME RESERVE
itinerary.description: On this day you enjoy Morning and Afternoon Game drives on a full board basis. Mid afternoon at leisure at the swimming pool.

itinerary.title: SAMBURU GAME RESERVE - NAIROBI
itinerary.description: After breakfast, have an en-route Game drive as you depart for Nairobi arriving late afternoon. Drop off at Sentrim Boulevard or 680 Hotel Nairobi.

itinerary.title: DEPARTURE
itinerary.description: Breakfast at the hotel, check-out and transfer to the airport for outbound flight.

itinerary.title: NAIROBI - NYERI
itinerary.description: Depart Nairobi through Kikuyu land to Nyeri in time for lunch. This is a medium sized town which you explore in the afternoon. Dinner and overnight in a budget hotel.

itinerary.title: Hike to Reedbuck Camp
itinerary.description: After breakfast hike to Reedbuck camp through the dense Bamboo forest arriving in time for lunch noodles and sandwich, a distance of about 9 km duration of about 4-5 kms depending on the trekkers pace. Afternoon by a vehicle to several view points ie, Karuru falls, Gura falls and the Queens caves. Dinner and overnight at a campsite.

itinerary.title: Hike to Hygenia Camp
itinerary.description: Hike to Hygenia  camp. Here, the vegetation opens up and superb views and wildlife can be seen when trekking like Buffalo, as well as a variety of antelopes. This day too we visit Chania falls. Distance of 14 kms taking about 5-7 hrs. Dinner and overnight at a campsite.

itinerary.title: Trek to Car Park Camp
itinerary.description: After breakfast we trek through the hygenia which is covered to Car park camp for lunch and then on a 4x4 we ascend to road head. From here on a clear day you are able to see the whole mountain from different directions. Distance 14 kms taking about 5-7 hrs. Dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: Oldony Lesatima Summit
itinerary.description: After breakfast we start for the summit Olndoinyo Lesatima. The views on this day are spectacular and superb especially if the weather is clear. We return to the camp for lunch and after descend further to the Ark / Treetops tree hotel for dinner and overnight. Distance of 13 kms taking about 5-6 hrs.

itinerary.title: DEPARTURE
itinerary.description: After breakfast the clients are driven to Nairobi or to other destinations as per the program.

itinerary.title: Nairobi – Maji Moto- Ndarara Camp
itinerary.description: Leave Nairobi at 9.30 am to Maji Moto for lunch. Hike to the Olganyiru hill to view the panorama, later return to our camp for dinner and overnight Ndarara main camp.

itinerary.title: Ndarara – Letukunyi
itinerary.description: After breakfast walk to the hills to see the beautiful sceneries and proceed to Letukuyi for dinner and overnight. Trek takes 5-6 hrs.

itinerary.title: Letukuyi – Morijo
itinerary.description: Leave Motorok after breakfast after breakfast to Nadugoro Caves ( oltulelei ) via Narosora shopping centre. Dinner and over night at Morijo camp.

itinerary.title: Morijo – Enkutoto
itinerary.description: After breakfast leave Morijo camp the walk will be through the forest lunch enroute to Enkutoto camp for dinner and overnight.

itinerary.title: Enkutoto – Nguruman.
itinerary.description: Leave Enkutoto and walk through the left side of the Great Rift Valley via the nguruman escarpment to Nguruman town for dinner and overnight. En route to the camp offers a good and clear view of Lake Magadi, Ngong hills and Lake Natron in Tanzania in a clear day.

itinerary.title: Nguruman – Nairobi
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive back to Nairobi arriving in the afternoon for your outbound flight.
